typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	YearQuarter as string
}
source(output(
		userId as string,
		age as string,
		birthYear as string,
		generation as string,
		age_category as string,
		social_state as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedCustomerData
source(output(
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		City as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SocialMediaData
CuratedCustomerData filter(!isNull(userId)) ~> FilterNulls
SelectRequiredRows derive(IsAdult = case(toInteger(Age) > 18, "Yes", "No")) ~> AddingIsAdultColumn
join1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRows
FilterNulls select(mapColumn(
		User = userId,
		Age = age,
		Generation = generation,
		BirthYear = birthYear
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredRows
AddingIsAdultColumn join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
AlterRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sk_seller as integer,
		seller_id as string,
		seller_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		seller_city as string,
		seller_state as string,
		no_of_products_sold as integer,
		product_categories_sold as string,
		seller_size as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['sk_seller'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		sk_seller = User,
		seller_id = IsAdult,
		seller_zip_code_prefix = Generation,
		seller_city = BirthYear,
		seller_state,
		seller_size,
		scd_created_at,
		scd_is_current = IsAdult
	)) ~> sinkwithUpdatingSCD
